Heroes.Name: Thoran
Heroes.EliteSet: Recovers 3% HP per second for 4s and reduces damage taken by 10% when the HP ratio drops below 30% for the first time.
Heroes.EpicSet: Recovers 3% HP per second for 8s and reduces damage taken by 20% when the HP ratio drops below 30% for the first time.
Heroes.LegMythicSet: Recovers 3% HP per second for 8s and reduces damage taken by 20% when the HP ratio drops below 30% for the first time. This healing is triggered again after 15s, but at a reduced rate, recovering only 2% HP per second.

Heroes.Name: Damian
Heroes.EliteSet: Restores 80% HP for the weakest ally every 8s. The healed ally will only receive 20% healing when again by this skill within 5s.
Heroes.EpicSet: Restores 100% HP for the weakest ally every 5s. The healed ally will only receive 20% healing when again by this skill within 5s.
Heroes.LegMythicSet: Restores 100% HP for the 2 weakest allies every 5s. However, if allies have been healed by this skill within the last 5s, the will only recover 20% HP.
